item.description:
Join us for a fun and affordable night of traditional Cape Verdean cuisine and live music at Restaurante Cesaria in Dorchester, MA

 

At the moment, they seem to be having trouble with their website, but you can take a peak at their menu here:

http://openmenu.com/restaurant/20ef2536-15bb-11e0-b40e-0018512e6b26

 

As always, Portuguese conversation is encouraged and if you know Cape Verdean Kriolu, even better.

 

Hope to see you there!

MUSIC: generally starts between 8 and 8:30pm

 

***Due to the increased interest level in attending this meet up, we've increased the RSVP limit to 12 guests and have confirmed this with the restaurant staff.

Because of this and the fact the restaurant will also be very busy that night, it is essential that you only RSVP "yes" if you are absolutely planning on attending.

Since no one can control the future, please be sure to update your RSVP status on this page and/or inform Tonya or Elsa as soon as your plans change.

We want to make this as enjoyable as possible for everyone and are doing are best to accommodate everyone who has demonstrated in interest in this Cape Verdean immersion event.

Thank you and we look forward to seeing you there!

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Cape Verdean style dinner and music at Cesaria's in Dorchester
